001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.output;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Property;
006
007/**
008 * Builder to create {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput }.
009 * Creates file output.
010 * <table class="table">
011 * <caption><strong>Properties retrieved from LogProperties</strong></caption>
012 * <tr>
013 * <th>Property Pattern</th>
014 * <th>Type</th>
015 * <th>Required</th>
016 * <th>Default</th>
017 * <th>Description</th>
018 * </tr>
019 * <tr>
020 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_uri }</code></td>
021 * <td><code>URI</code></td>
022 * <td><code>false</code></td>
023 * <td><code>null</code></td>
024 * <td>File uri.</td>
025 * </tr>
026 * <tr>
027 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_fileName }</code></td>
028 * <td><code>String</code></td>
029 * <td><code>false</code></td>
030 * <td><code>null</code></td>
031 * <td>File name.</td>
032 * </tr>
033 * <tr>
034 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_append }</code></td>
035 * <td><code>Boolean</code></td>
036 * <td><code>false</code></td>
037 * <td><code>null</code></td>
038 * <td>Whether or not to append to existing file.</td>
039 * </tr>
040 * <tr>
041 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_prudent }</code></td>
042 * <td><code>Boolean</code></td>
043 * <td><code>false</code></td>
044 * <td><code>null</code></td>
045 * <td>Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.</td>
046 * </tr>
047 * <tr>
048 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_bufferSize }</code></td>
049 * <td><code>Integer</code></td>
050 * <td><code>true</code></td>
051 * <td>{@value io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE }</td>
052 * <td>Buffer size in bytes.</td>
053 * </tr>
054 * </table>
055 */
056public final class FileOutputBuilder implements io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogBuilder<FileOutputBuilder,io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput> {
057
058        /**
059         * The properties to be retrieved from config will have
060         * this prefix.
061         */
062        static final String PROPERTY_PREFIX = "logging.output.{name}.";
063        
064        /**
065         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_uri } = java.net.URI</code> File uri.
066         */
067        static final String PROPERTY_uri = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "uri";
068        /**
069         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_fileName } = java.lang.String</code> File name.
070         */
071        static final String PROPERTY_fileName = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "fileName";
072        /**
073         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_append } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Whether or not to append to existing file.
074         */
075        static final String PROPERTY_append = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "append";
076        /**
077         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_prudent } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
078         */
079        static final String PROPERTY_prudent = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "prudent";
080        /**
081         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_bufferSize } = java.lang.Integer</code> Buffer size in bytes.
082         */
083        static final String PROPERTY_bufferSize = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "bufferSize";
084        
085        private final String propertyPrefix;
086        final Property<java.net.URI> property_uri;
087        final Property<java.lang.String> property_fileName;
088        final Property<java.lang.Boolean> property_append;
089        final Property<java.lang.Boolean> property_prudent;
090        final Property<java.lang.Integer> property_bufferSize;
091        
092        private final java.lang.String name;
093        private java.net.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable URI uri = null;
094        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String fileName = null;
095        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean append = null;
096        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean prudent = null;
097        private java.lang.Integer bufferSize = io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput.DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
098        
099        /**
100         * Create a builder for {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput }.
101         * @param name will fill <code>{name}</code> in <code>logging.output.{name}.</code>. Name of output not file name.
102         */
103        public FileOutputBuilder(
104                        java.lang.String name
105                        ) {
106                java.util.Map<String,String> prefixParameters = java.util.Map.of(
107                                "name", name
108                        );
109                this.propertyPrefix = LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_PREFIX, prefixParameters);
110                this.name = name;
111                property_uri = Property.builder()
112                        .ofURI()
113                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_uri, prefixParameters));
114
115                property_fileName = Property.builder()
116                                                .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_fileName, prefixParameters));
117
118                property_append = Property.builder()
119                        .ofBoolean()
120                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_append, prefixParameters));
121
122                property_prudent = Property.builder()
123                        .ofBoolean()
124                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_prudent, prefixParameters));
125
126                property_bufferSize = Property.builder()
127                        .ofInt()
128                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_bufferSize, prefixParameters));
129
130        }
131
132
133        
134        /**
135         * Sets uri.
136         * File uri.
137         * Default is <code>null</code>.
138         * @param uri <code>{@value #PROPERTY_uri } = java.net.URI</code> File uri.
139         * @return this builder.
140         */
141        public FileOutputBuilder uri(java.net.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable URI uri) {
142                this.uri = uri;
143                return this;
144        }
145        
146        /**
147         * Sets fileName.
148         * File name.
149         * Default is <code>null</code>.
150         * @param fileName <code>{@value #PROPERTY_fileName } = java.lang.String</code> File name.
151         * @return this builder.
152         */
153        public FileOutputBuilder fileName(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String fileName) {
154                this.fileName = fileName;
155                return this;
156        }
157        
158        /**
159         * Sets append.
160         * Whether or not to append to existing file.
161         * Default is <code>null</code>.
162         * @param append <code>{@value #PROPERTY_append } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Whether or not to append to existing file.
163         * @return this builder.
164         */
165        public FileOutputBuilder append(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean append) {
166                this.append = append;
167                return this;
168        }
169        
170        /**
171         * Sets prudent.
172         * Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
173         * Default is <code>null</code>.
174         * @param prudent <code>{@value #PROPERTY_prudent } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
175         * @return this builder.
176         */
177        public FileOutputBuilder prudent(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean prudent) {
178                this.prudent = prudent;
179                return this;
180        }
181        
182        /**
183         * Sets <strong>required</strong> bufferSize.
184         * Buffer size in bytes.
185         * Default is {@value io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE }.
186         * @param bufferSize <code>{@value #PROPERTY_bufferSize } = java.lang.Integer</code> Buffer size in bytes.
187         * @return this builder.
188         */
189        public FileOutputBuilder bufferSize(java.lang.Integer bufferSize) {
190                this.bufferSize = bufferSize;
191                return this;
192        }
193        
194        /**
195         * Creates {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput } from this builder.
196         * @return {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput }.
197         * @throws java.io.UncheckedIOException if factory method fails.
198         */
199        public io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput build()  throws java.io.UncheckedIOException{
200                return io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput.of(
201                                this.name
202                                , this.uri
203                                , this.fileName
204                                , this.append
205                                , this.prudent
206                                , property_bufferSize.require(this.bufferSize)
207                                );
208        }
209        
210        @Override
211        public FileOutputBuilder fromProperties(LogProperties properties) {
212                var __v = LogProperty.Validator.of(this.getClass());
213                var _uri = property_uri.get(properties).or(this.uri);
214                __v.addIfError(_uri);
215                var _fileName = property_fileName.get(properties).or(this.fileName);
216                __v.addIfError(_fileName);
217                var _append = property_append.get(properties).or(this.append);
218                __v.addIfError(_append);
219                var _prudent = property_prudent.get(properties).or(this.prudent);
220                __v.addIfError(_prudent);
221                var _bufferSize = property_bufferSize.get(properties).or(this.bufferSize);
222                __v.add(_bufferSize);
223                __v.validate();
224                this.uri = _uri.valueOrNull();
225                this.fileName = _fileName.valueOrNull();
226                this.append = _append.valueOrNull();
227                this.prudent = _prudent.valueOrNull();
228                this.bufferSize = _bufferSize.value();
229                return this;
230        }
231        
232        /**
233         * Turns the builder into java.util.Properties like Map skipping values that are null.
234         * @param consumer apply is called where first arg is key and second is value.
235         */
236        public void toProperties(java.util.function.BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) {
237                var _uri = this.uri;
238                if (_uri != null) {
239                        consumer.accept(property_uri.key(), property_uri.propertyString(_uri));
240                }
241                var _fileName = this.fileName;
242                if (_fileName != null) {
243                        consumer.accept(property_fileName.key(), property_fileName.propertyString(_fileName));
244                }
245                var _append = this.append;
246                if (_append != null) {
247                        consumer.accept(property_append.key(), property_append.propertyString(_append));
248                }
249                var _prudent = this.prudent;
250                if (_prudent != null) {
251                        consumer.accept(property_prudent.key(), property_prudent.propertyString(_prudent));
252                }
253                var _bufferSize = this.bufferSize;
254                if (_bufferSize != null) {
255                        consumer.accept(property_bufferSize.key(), property_bufferSize.propertyString(_bufferSize));
256                }
257        }
258        
259        /**
260         * The interpolated property prefix: {@value #PROPERTY_PREFIX}.
261         * @return resolved prefix which should end with a "<code>.</code>".
262         */
263        @Override
264        public String propertyPrefix() {
265                return this.propertyPrefix;
266        }
267        
268}
